%dw 2.0
type employeeArr = Array<{| country: String, role: String, address: String, gender: String, city: String, name: String, id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, age: Number {"typeId": "int"}, lastname: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"country\\\":\\\"Mexico\\\",\\\"role\\\":\\\"Lead Engineer\\\",\\\"address\\\":\\\"Selene 500, satelite\\\",\\\"gender\\\":\\\"Male\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"Oaxaca\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"Everardo\\\",\\\"id\\\":1,\\\"age\\\":29,\\\"lastname\\\":\\\"Flores\\\"},{\\\"country\\\":\\\"Mexico\\\",\\\"role\\\":\\\"Tester Jr\\\",\\\"address\\\":\\\"Selene 500, satelite\\\",\\\"gender\\\":\\\"Male\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"Oaxaca\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"Jhon\\\",\\\"id\\\":2,\\\"age\\\":20,\\\"lastname\\\":\\\"Eugenio\\\"}]"}
